articles.title: Archaeologists find stunning link between Halley's Comet and ancient Christianity - Daily Express
articles.description: ARCHAEOLOGISTS have drawn an extraordinary link between the passing of Halley's Comet in the 6th century and the emergence of Christianity in Ireland.
